title: The Mill on the Floss - Dodsons not approve of

content.question: Which of the following would the Dodsons probably NOT approve of in a family member?

choices.label: A social relationship with the clergy
A display of pride in oneâ€™s ancestry
An indifference to the value of property
A tendency to criticize a wayward relative

content.answer: An indifference to the value of property

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
